task.shortdesc: You can verify the installation of by using the Messaging Tester demonstration application.

step.cmd: Go to the Messaging Tester page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click Messaging Tester in the Verify your configuration with the Message Gateway Messaging Tester pane.
From the Messaging menu, click Messaging Tester.

step.cmd: Follow the instructions on the Messaging Tester page to complete the verification procedure.
